msg.msgText: The "{0}" cannot be set to "{1}" because the "LTPAProfile or AllowNullPassword" is set.

msgExplanation.p: The configuration object cannot be set to the value since the LTPAProfile or AllowNullPassword is set.

msgUserResponse.p: If the configuration object is required to set to the value, change the 'LTPAProfile= or AllowNullPassword=' and run command again.
